description: React component for uploading and parsing resumes. The component allows users to select a resume file, parses it client-side using an imported utility, and maps the extracted information into a Zustand store for later use. The component manages user interactions, file input handling, and visual feedback on parsing status.

methods.name: resetStatus
methods.description: Resets the status state to 'idle' with an empty message.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Triggers the file input click event to open file selector.

methods.name: safeSetArray
methods.description: Safely sets an array of items into the store, ensuring arrays are initialized and populated correctly.

methods.name: mapParsedToStore
methods.description: Maps the parsed resume object into the store fields, handling different sections like personal info, experience, education, and skills.

methods.name: onFileChange
methods.description: Handles the file input change event, triggers parsing, updates status, and maps parsed data to store.
